 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנַ֫יִם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁתַּיִם‎</span> (Philippi<sup>ZMG xlix (1895), 202</sup> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:97b»§ 97b</sup> note):768 **noun masculine and feminine dual** ==two== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אשנם‎</span> (and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שנ‎</span> ***second***), Punic <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שנם‎</span> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>380</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֿני‎</span> [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Chr 47</sup>, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תְּרֵין‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּנְיָנָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***second***); Nabataean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תרין‎</span>, Palmyrene feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תרתן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תרתיא‎</span>, [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>388</sup>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šinâ;***</u></abbr> on etymology see √, and especially Philippi<sup>ZMG xxxii (1878), 21-98</sup>); — 

**masculine** (with **masculine noun**) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנַיִם‎</span> [[Amos.3.3|Amos 3:3]] +; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנֵי‎</span> [[Isa.7.16|Isa 7:16]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנֵיהֶם‎</span> [[Gen.2.25|Gen 2:25]] +, etc.; **feminine** (with **feminine noun**) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁתַּיִם‎</span> [[Amos.4.8|Amos 4:8]] +; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁתֵּי‎</span> [[Gen.4.19|Gen 4:19]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּשְׁתֵּי‎</span> [[Isa.7.21|Isa 7:21]] +, etc., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְּׁתֵֿי‎</span> [[Judg.16.28|Judg 16:28]] (see [[BDB#GFM|GFM]]); suffixes see below (2 + 10 = 12, see below); Hexateuch chiefly [[BDB#P|P]]; — ***two:*** 

**1.** no other number: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** usually construct before plural noun (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְמִידִים‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנֵי‎</span> [[Gen.24.22|Gen 24:22]] + 19 t. + [[2Sam.23.20|2Sam 23:20]] \|\| [[1Chr.11.22|1Chr 11:22]] (insert <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּנֵי‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#The|Th]] modern, otherwise [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Semitic i. 469, 2nd ed., 488</sup>); (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשִׁים‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁתֵּי‎</span> [[Gen.4.19|Gen 4:19]] + 132 t., [[1Sam.10.4|1Sam 10:4]] insert <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּכְּרוֺת‎</span> [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Now|Now]]; [[Lev.16.21|Lev 16:21]] read dual <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָדָיו‎</span> [[BDB#Qr|Qr]], + [[Judg.16.28|Judg 16:28]] (see above) + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁתֵּיאֵֿלֶּה‎</span> [[Isa.47.9|Isa 47:9]] ***both these things***; before singular noun, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנֵי‎</span> [[Exod.16.22|Exod 16:22]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:134e»§ 134e</sup>); suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנֵיתֶם‎</span> ***the two of them*** [[Gen.2.25|Gen 2:25]] + 62 t., + [[Prov.24.22|Prov 24:22]] (&gt; ***their years*** [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[BDB#De|De]] and others; probably corrupt, see Toy), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנֵינוּ‎</span> [[Gen.31.37|Gen 31:37]] + 2 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנֵיכֶם‎</span> [[Gen.27.45|Gen 27:45]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁתֵּיהֶם‎</span> (masculine suffix! [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:135o»§ 135o</sup>) [[Ruth.1.19|Ruth 1:19]]; [[Ruth.4.11|Ruth 4:11]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵ֯הֶן‎</span> [[1Sam.25.43|1Sam 25:43]]; [[Ezek.23.13|Ezek 23:13]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** absolute (1) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנַ֫יִם‎</span> (90 t.), before plural noun [[Judg.11.37|Judg 11:37]] + 26 t.; after plural noun [[2Sam.1.1|2Sam 1:1]]; [[Exod.29.1|Exod 29:1]]+ 21 t. (usually [[BDB#P|P]] Chronicles), singular noun (collective) [[Gen.46.27|Gen 46:27]]; [[Num.7.17|Num 7:17]] + 11 t. [[Num.17|Num 17]] noun omitted [[Gen.7.2|Gen 7:2]]; [[Gen.44.27|Gen 44:27]] + 26 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> distributive [[Gen.7.9|Gen 7:9]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִשׁ‎</span> cut ***in two*** [[2Kgs.3.25|2Kgs 3:25]]; [[Jer.34.18|Jer 34:18]] = ***double amount*** [[Exod.22.3|Exod 22:3]]; [[Exod.22.6|Exod 22:6]]; [[Exod.22.8|Exod 22:8]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּי שׁ‎</span> [[Deut.21.17|Deut 21:17]] ***double portion***, + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּרוּחֲךָ‎</span> [[2Kgs.2.9|2Kgs 2:9]] ***in*** (of) ***thy spirit***, + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּהּ‎</span> [[Zech.3.18|Zech 3:18]] (2) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁתַּ֫יִם‎</span> (55 t.) before plural noun [[1Kgs.3.16|1Kgs 3:16]] + 16 t.; after plural noun (usually [[BDB#P|P]] and late) [[2Chr.24.3|2Chr 24:3]] + 9 t.; noun omitted, = ***two things*** [[Isa.51.19|Isa 51:19]]; [[Job.13.20|Job 13:20]]; [[Prov.30.7|Prov 30:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁתַּיִם‎</span> = ***twice*** [[2Kgs.6.10|2Kgs 6:10]]; [[Job.40.5|Job 40:5]]; [[Ps.62.12|Ps 62:12]] (or as [[Prov.30.7|Prov 30:7]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּשׁ‎</span> [[Job.33.14|Job 33:14]] either so, or ***in two ways*** [[BDB#RV|RVm]] (see [[BDB#De|De]]); as ordinal <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּשְׁנַת שְׁתַּיִם לְ‎</span> [[1Kgs.15.25|1Kgs 15:25]] + 9 t., etc.; (3) as round number, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנַיִם עֵצִים‎</span> [[1Kgs.17.12|1Kgs 17:12]] ***a few sticks*** (German 'ein paar'), compare [[2Kgs.9.32|2Kgs 9:32]]; [[Isa.17.6|Isa 17:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁתַּיִם שָׁלשׁ‎</span> [[Amos.4.8|Amos 4:8]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּעַם וּשְׁתָּ֑יִם‎</span> [[Neh.13.20|Neh 13:20]], compare [[Jer.3.14|Jer 3:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶחָד מֵעִיר וּשְׁנַיִם מִמִּשְׁפָּחָה‎</span> = a small number; [[Ezra.10.13|Ezra 10:13]] ***not for one or two days*** (but for many), [[2Kgs.6.10|2Kgs 6:10]]. 

**2.** ***twelve:*** with **noun masculine** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנֵים עָשָׂר‎</span> [[Gen.42.13|Gen 42:13]] + 87 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִשְׁנֵי עָשָׂר‎</span> [[Exod.28.21|Exod 28:21]] + 4 t.; with **noun feminine** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁתֵּים עֶשְׂרֵה‎</span> [[Exod.24.4|Exod 24:4]] + 34 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁתֵּי עֶשְׂרֵה‎</span> [[Ezek.32.1|Ezek 32:1]]; [[Ezek.32.17|Ezek 32:17]]; [[Ezek.33.21|Ezek 33:21]] before plural noun [[Gen.17.20|Gen 17:20]]; [[Exod.15.27|Exod 15:27]] +; after plural noun [[Num.7.84|Num 7:84]] (twice in verse) +; before singular noun [[Exod.28.21|Exod 28:21]] +, [[Gen.14.4|Gen 14:4]] (12 ***year***) +, etc.; as ordinal, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺם בְּיוֺם שְׁנֵים עָשָׂר‎</span> [[Num.7.78|Num 7:78]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּשְׁתֵּי עֶשְׂרֵה שָׁנָה‎</span> [[Ezek.32.1|Ezek 32:1]] +, etc. 

**3.** with larger number: 10 (etc.) + 2, [[2Sam.8.5|2Sam 8:5]]; [[Judg.10.3|Judg 10:3]] + 56 t.; 2 + 10 (etc.) [[Num.1.35|Num 1:35]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[2Chr.22.2|2Chr 22:2]] + 18 t. ([[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1. 215 ff.</sup> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:97f»§ 97f</sup>.); 200 + 2 + 30, [[1Kgs.20.15|1Kgs 20:15]] 50 + 2 as ordinal [[2Kgs.15.27|2Kgs 15:27]] + 2 t.; compare 2 + 20, [[1Chr.24.17|1Chr 24:17]]. 



 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תנא‎</span> ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] Syriac; = Biblical Hebrew II. <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שָׁנָה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁנַיִם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שֵׁנִי‎</span>).
